column4: hello, please can somebody tell me if im on edgy how do I downgrade php
or do I have to install from source?
downgrade to what?
earlier version of php5
then you'll need to compile from source, yeah.  5.1 was in Dapper too, you know
Edgy gets 18 month, Dapper gets 3 years, Edgy is four months after Dapper, so Dapper will be around for about a year longer
Year.Month
five years is "quite a bit"?
assuming you're using only official repositories, fairly.
You've got 16 months to schedule downtime
they're now compiz.
ahh, i see, and does Ubuntu have these packages in their source?
I know it have Beryl, but wonder about screenlets, etc from compiz?
or would that be a gutsy implementation wit the new gnome, etc?

Ubuntu has compiz in main and beryl in universe.  The merge was announced after Feisty was released, so no changes have happened yet.  Not sure about gutsy.  Gutsy too seems to have them separate.  I'm not sure if compiz/beryl have completed (or even started the majority of) the merge
I see, so screenlets in feisty is actually called compiz?
eh?  What?
i'll do a apt-cache show and have a look see
as far as Ubuntu is concerned (for feisty, and whoknows hwo gutsy will turn out), theyre still completely separate projects
thanks
wonder how that will work with the upgrade, going to be alot of package removal/reinstallation i guess
no.  When it eventually happens, there'll just be transitional packages.  It'll all work out more orless.  Well, except the config files, since I imagine they're quite different.
true...
